definition: any undertaking that is easy to do, eat alfresco, in the open air
details:
noun
- any undertaking that is easy to do
= example: any undertaking that is easy to do
= synonyms: snap
- any informal meal eaten outside or on an excursion
- a day devoted to an outdoor social gathering
= synonyms: outing
verb
- eat alfresco, in the open air
= example: eat alfresco, in the open air
